articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Bank of Maharashtra to divest 4% stake in ISARC by Dec-end
articles.description: The bank will divest its entire stake in ISARC for a consideration of  ₹3.92 crore. The transaction is expected to close by December 2022-end.
articles.content: Government-owned Bank of Maharashtra on Thursday announced the execution of a share purchase to divest its entire stake of 4% in India SME Asset Reconstruction Company (ISARC).
